originalText.text:
Very positive experience,I highly recommend Ny City blindes Guy the Owner Help me to chose right product  Ben the sales person coordinate with the whole process front the beginning to the end and my apt looks amazing!!!!!
Excellent service thank you. Very much!

Excellent service thank you. Very much!

originalText.text: I received my motorized shades and drapery installed by NY City Blinds on the Upper East Side. I am beyond ecstatic with the workmanship, professionalism, attention to detail, kind attitude and the superb customer service. Mauricio was my design consultant and I can't say enough wonderful things about him. He listened intently to my needs, came up with some interesting ideas based on my needs and the final result was absolutely stunning!!! This company is amazing! They go above and beyond to please the customer and I can't recommend them enough! If you need this kind of work in your place, NY City Blinds on the Upper East Side is the go to for it!

originalText.text: I would like to recommend this company. I had my blinds installed a few months ago. Overall, the process was very easy and the team was extremely efficient. This company is trustworthy, and I highly recommend them to anyone who’s looking for window coverings.

text.text: I would like to recommend this company. I had my blinds installed a few months ago. Overall, the process was very easy and the team was extremely efficient. This company is trustworthy, and I highly recommend them to anyone who’s looking for window coverings.

originalText.text:
I had posted a 1 star review as my initial experience with one of the sales representatives was sub par- I am fully retracting this 1 star review- Mr. Guy Haber- the CEO of the company is innovative and is a pleasure to work with. The company is true to their words and aim for customer satisfaction. New better fitting blinds are being installed in an expedited fashion. We have 2 more windows to be fitted for solar/light blocking blinds and I will definitely move forward with NY city blinds with utmost confidence.
Anasuya Vasudevan

originalText.text:
Pros: products seemed to be of acceptable manufacturing quality in terms of construction and fabric though they do not fit the windows and do not otherwise serve the intended purpose

Cons: does not work as advertised; very bad value; company does not honor its warrantees; zero customer service

We bought automatic black-out blinds when we remodeled a West Village condo. We did not occupy the condo for some time while the remodeling was being done, and when we finally did we were unpleasantly surprised to find that the blinds did not fit the windows. With the blinds down, they left a substantial gap of about 5” that was left uncovered on either side of the blinds. With so much of the windows left uncovered by the “dark-out blinds” so much light comes in that they are useless for the purpose.we now have to use towels to cover the windows, after paying thousands of dollars for the new blinds!

It is obvious that NY City Blinds made a serious mistake when they measured the windows as part of their custom job, and combined this with a terrible installation. To our surprise they have consistently refused to do anything, not even coming back to look at their installation. We have good automatic black-out blinds — i.e. blinds that fit and are properly installed and  that block out the light — in other units in Manhattan and in our other homes elsewhere, and this is the only time we have had such a problem.

When we contacted NY City Blinds to address the issue, they just claimed everything they did was adequate and refused to even come out and look at the job or do offer any kind of fix. No reliable company would take thousands of dollars to slap inadequate products on with a low quality installation, but apparently this fits the standards of  NY City Blinds. We are now faced with a choice between finding someone else to fix the problem and forgetting about the thousands we wasted with NY City Blinds, or filing a small claims suit to recover from this company that did such a poor job and refuses to stand behind its warrantee.

We suggested looking elsewhere when ordering blinds. We certainly will.
